title: Raila Raila Song Lyrics in Tamil Naadodigal 2
stanzas:
Railaa railaa odum railaa
manasaiyum kadathuriye
kayiraa kayiraa nylon kayiraa
vayasaiyum ilukkuiye

kannaala kaavadiyaa, ammadi
ennaiyum thookkuriye, ayyodi
unnaala en naadiyila
erumbooruthadi, ini
naanthana un jodi.

aagaaya oonjal
pole un paarva
azhagaaga aala thookki
mela veesuthey.

oli yethum pechula
usuroram paei mazha
koda saanji naanum poga
kolam poduthey

kaanaalathan saamigala, naanthaan
paarthen un sayalila, aamaa
un kaiviral modhayila
kuyil koovuthu moolaiyila

paanjaali sela
pole en kadhal
una sera yaengi yaengi
neelamaaguthey

olungaaga roatula
nadai pota kaalume
una paarkum aasaiyaala
aattam poduthey.

kaathora seithigala, aahaa!
nee pesum velaiyila, o hoo!
kan thoongavum koodalaye
dhinam koottura kaadhalaiye

seo.title: Raila Raila Song Lyrics in Tamil Naadodigal 2
seo.description: Raila Raila Song Lyrics in Tamil Naadodigal 2 - Tamil song lyrics from Naadodigal 2
